articles.author: Bill McColl
articles.title: Micron Stock Plunges After Company Cuts Outlook, Analysts Raise Concerns - Investopedia
articles.description: Micron Technology shares tanked Thursday after the chipmaker warned about near-term demand issues.
articles.content:
• Micron Technology shares tanked Thursday after the chipmaker warned about near-term demand issues.
  • Bank of America analysts lowered their rating on Micron's stock and cut their price … [+1963 chars]

articles.author: Marie Heuclin, AFP
articles.title: After securing a top spot in Trump's cabinet, concerns grow as Elon Musk influences the U.K.'s future ties with the U.S. - Fortune
articles.description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk is taking an increasingly close interest in Britain's political scene, appearing to cosy up to hard-right Nigel Farage.
